UPnP Browser. version 1.1.0


 Using this tool you are able to spot UPnP devices on your network and browse their services/actions/arguments.

 When you see the list of arguments of an action you can invoke the given action selecting 'Invoke' option from the menu.

 You can find sourcecode of this application at https://github.com/mikebevz/UPnPBrowser

 If you need a feature, want to report a bug - make a new issue on Github.
 
 In case you just wanna say thank you drop me a letter at myb@theappfellas.com.

 Cheers,

 Mike
